MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the CH6 postcode area of Flint, affecting properties in Albert Avenue, Prince of Wales Avenue, and the surrounding area. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:00am to complete repairs to a fault on the underground cable network. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 1:00 pm. We will update this message if the situation changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:41 am on 8th January, 2021.
